item.title: Webinar - Extended Reality (XR) - Nicety to Necessity
item.description: Techgig is the largest community of developers, also organizes webinars on emerging technologies. I will be speaking a webinar on Extended Reality (XR) - Moving from Nicety to Necessity on coming Aug 13, at 3PM IST. Please book your seat and explore new realities. Highlights COVID-19 has impacted economies, businesses and human behaviour. The sudden change has forced organizations to embrace digital-first at accelerated speeds. The ensuing chaos has given emerging tech like XR the opportunity to become a need-to-have over a nice-to-have in industries like health, retail, manufacturing and more.

item.title: Panelist & Organizer - Essentials of XR Product Development
item.description: The VRAR Association’s Product Design and Development (PDD) Community of Practice (COP) bring series of webinars, First was planned on 11th July 2020, and supposed to be hosted by Mr. Tejinder Jassal , and with co-speaker/panelist Mr. Aditya Bhatnagar and Mr. Raju Kandasamy Highlights Understanding XR technologies What it takes to build XR products and solutions XR in Education How it is going from “nice to have” to “must have” choice in this COVID time?
